text:
"I'm in Miami Bitch'" (also known by the clean title "I'm in Miami Trick'") is a 2008 Electro hop/alternative hip hop/dance song by American electro hop group, LMFAO. The song was the theme song for the television show Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami, The "New York" version was used for the television show Kourtney and Kim Take New York and the song was featured in a commercial on the show. The lyrics to the song is usually changed depending on which city LMFAO performs in (for example "I'm in Chicago Bitch").
The song reached #27 on the Australian Singles Chart, #27 on the U.S. "Billboard" Pop Songs, #37 on the Canadian Hot 100 and #51 on the U.S. "Billboard" Hot 100.

annotations.surface_form: Kourtney and Kim Take New York
